segments.text: I notice the woman so absorbed in her task, it's kind of lonely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's flooding the sink, but she doesn't see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to mischief, stealing cookies quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool the boy's on looks so unsteady, it breaks my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One fall could hurt him badly, and no one's watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting eagerly, but this feels wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view just highlights how fragile this moment is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for the family, all this unnoticed trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress seem so ordinary, yet disaster looms.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's growing, soaking everything, it's depressing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't they just enjoy the day without risks?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them, save them from the sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR
